headline: MGM Resorts: Undervalued Too Long, It Needs To Spin Off Its Digital Unit To Build Real Value
summary: MGM's base business is strong but doesn't impress investors. Its BetMGM online is a potential big winner as a spin-off. Click here to find out why MGM is a Buy.
